subject: Rewrite Red Thread GP5 generator with musically cohesive content
description: Complete rewrite of red_thread_gp5.py addressing: (1) actual riffs not just chord blocks, (2) ghost notes on drums, (3) rhythmic variation within sections, (4) Track 1 constant E pulse throughout, (5) drum fills at transitions, (6) bass track on all songs, (7) Runloop velocity wave, (8) proper melodic motifs
